original_text:
Then Judas, the one who would betray him, said, “Surely you don’t mean me, Rabbi?”
Jesus answered, “You have said so.”
korean_text: 예수를 파는 유다가 대답하여 이르되 랍비여 나는 아니지요 대답하시되 네가 말하였도다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Then Judas, the one who would betray him, said
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 유다, 그를 배신할 자,가 말하였다

sentences.original_text: Surely you don't mean me, Rabbi?
